name: my-streaming-pipeline
description: A streaming pipeline that reads purchase events from Pub/Sub, writes aggregations to BigQuery, and sends alerts to another Pub/Sub topic.

parameters.name: input_topic
parameters.label: Pub/Sub Input Topic
parameters.helpText: Pub/Sub topic name to read streaming events (e.g. projects/PROJECT_ID/topics/TOPIC_NAME)

parameters.name: alert_topic
parameters.label: Alert Topic
parameters.helpText: Pub/Sub topic to send high-volume alerts (e.g. projects/PROJECT_ID/topics/TOPIC_NAME)

parameters.name: output_table
parameters.label: BigQuery Output Table
parameters.helpText: BigQuery table to write aggregated purchase data (PROJECT:DATASET.TABLE)

parameters.name: aggregation_window_sec
parameters.label: Aggregation Window (seconds)
parameters.helpText: Duration of the fixed window for grouping purchase data

parameters.name: alert_window_sec
parameters.label: Alert Window (seconds)
parameters.helpText: Duration of the fixed window for generating alerts

parameters.name: project
parameters.label: GCP Project ID
parameters.helpText: Google Cloud project ID where the Dataflow job will run

parameters.name: region
parameters.label: GCP Region
parameters.helpText: Region in which the Dataflow job will run (e.g. us-central1)
